content: it worked perfectly, I got excellent support
when first intalled, i had some difficulty, contacted the owner, he gave me an excellent brief, since then i have used it daily. great app and great support if needed.

3 years on this is an app that's a keeper. Never let me down. The Dev will help with any problems and add stations on request. Brilliant as a standalone radio player as well as alarm clock. I've recently discovered how good the night clock is, so have ditched old clock. Loads of settings to tweak to get everything perfect. This app doesn't have pretty fonts and cool animations, it does what it's supposed to do and does it extremely well. Well done dev for an exceptional app. Thanks.
replyContent:
Thanks a bunch :)

Greetings,
Benjamin

content: love it. our local radio station was added immediately after I emailed support. love waking to familiar voices and music. thank you so much for a great app.

Excellent, easy to use and ad-free alarm, with convenient features, plus lots of advanced options for those who need it. It made my morning wake-up routine more pleasant. The developer is very responsive and added suggested new stations very quickly. Any ads are from stream you choose, not the ap!

I loved (and still love) the free version of the app. I upgraded to be able to have a larger favourites list. I use this app every day and I have not regretted the upgrade. I really like the night radio and snooze feature. The app is really top notch and the developer is supet speedy to respond.
Love this, use it everyday and even in the car for internet radio on the way to work.
Fantastic App, I've been using it for a few years now. The developer has been improving things along the way. Best few quid I ever spent.

I use this every single day and has improved my wake-up routine immensely. Being able to choose radio stations from around the world in a easy to use app was exactly what I was looking for. It does it's job to perfection.

Awesome app that I use every day as my wake up alarm & to listen to the radio during the day. You can create a favorites list from the enormous selection of radio stations available which keeps your listening choices manageable. I like that the alarm gradually increases volume so you are not woken too abruptly. This is a well designed app that has all the features you need - just connect your phone to a bluetooth speaker & you are good to go!
Excellent & convenient App, now i can wake up to my favourite station every day.
Excellent app. Bought the paid version just to support the developer. Top work.
It's a radio alarm clock which means it plays radio to wake you up, and it performs this task spectacularly.
Brilliant app. Replaced bbc iplayer radio for me. Unusual visual style but u get used to it.
Works great. I love the features of this app and really appreciate the great options. Thank you Benjamin for quickly adding my regional channel!
replyContent: Hello, which bbc station is it exactly from the list? There are so many :) The 'news stream' is currently working. Ben

content: I'm generally a cheap person, but this app is worth the purchase, it has everything that I wanted from an alarm app and so much more. Pros: alarm appears in the drop down menu, you can set radio stations from around the world as your music sources, you can set a back up music incase some kind of problem occurs with streaming, can customize so much about all the alarm setting. Cons: the interface can be a little confusing at times.
From the last time e wrote a review this app has had major improvements good job
replyContent: Wow, that's a strange bug! Haven't noticed it myself until you wrote this. Thank you! I guess that's exactly why I made this function beta. I'll try to have it fixed soon, but it may take a little time, I'm busy and Google needs longer for reviewing apps too, since Corona. Ben

content: This is the gold standard of alarm clocks. Definitely recommend the paid version
Best app ever, love it, wakes me up with a üòä
Does exactly what it says, easy to use, no ads & a radio station for every preference. Thank you Benjamin
Not the world's prettiest interface, but it does everything you'll want from an alarm
It just works

Still outstanding. Just keeps getting better. Looking for an alarm clock that let me choose a range of alarm alerts including radio and this is by far the best. Now if I can just get it to work with the new Google Home Hub...
replyContent:
Hi, unfortunately I have not yet digged into all this Alexa, google home, etc programming, I'm sorry. What I'm doing on my Alexa at home is using it as a bluetooth speaker and have all my phone audio going over it, maybe that's a "compromise option" for you.

Kind regards,
Ben

content: Love it
replyContent:
General: Please  also check new Energy settings in Android settings, Maintenence, Battery - DISABLE auto standby and auto deactivation for apps please! Otherwise the alarm app might be deactivated after few days withut usage == no further alarms!

For others: Possibly an Android update was breaking the app, resetting to factory defaults might help.

content: Great alarm clock, very useful. One suggestion - would love to have a snooze volume slider (0 to 100% of the alarm volume), so I could have it that hitting the snooze button changes the volume down instead of muting it. üòé 26/12/20: Still love the app, hate the new icon though. The old one was very original, the new one looks like a 5min job, sloppy and ugly. üòï
replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback. I created many different icons for almost 2 days üòÖ I asked friends, tried to make it a 'less is more' Icon. I received lots of feedback over the years that the old Icon was so ugly :/
Please give it some time - every time Google invents new icons (maps app for ex.) I dislike those a lot in the beginning too. Now I like :)

content: Best alarm by Miles Finally an alarm i can set to wake to bbc4, has a night auto function torch, loads of options, the list is endless thank you üòä
Great, this stops me being grumpy when I wake up. Alarms make me capable of murder. I totally love it; I might escape capital punishment because of this app. Thanks üòä
Simple to use and reliable

Does work perfectly. Although there is a widget, but I miss the media player like buttons in the pull down notification of the player (next/ previous) which I think can help listen your favorite stations from anywhere without re-opening the the app or widget from the home screen, this would make it perfect as you don't have to stop doing whatever you are busy with.
replyContent: Hello, thanks for your review! Have you discovered the radio player home screen widget? This does provide previous and next buttons (with a short delay for smoother switching). Using this you don't even need to launch the app for playing radio. Hope that will help you! Greetings, Ben

content: Previously used BBC radio app but moved over when it stopped alarm function. Absolutely love this app! Don't really need any of the further things the paid version does but wanted to reward good design. Excellent app which does exactly what you need.
replyContent: Thank you! :)

content: Brilliant, reliable and AFAIK unique. No world traveller should leave the country without this app on their phone.
This has the best written terms and conditions I have ever seen. I read them all, understood them all and truly agreed with them all.
Laser focused on doing one thing well - replacing your bedside radio with your phone. Retro styling, but the main thing is it just does what you want. Worth paying for this full version.
Reliable, full featured. Good communication from their team - they answered questions promptly. Can't live without this app. Well, I can live, but I won't wake up on time.

Been using this app a while now and am impressed. Works well with no bugs, easy to use and great night/desk clock as well as radio alarm function. Can also be used with mp3 music and ringtones. Cannot fault so 5star

Stopped Working After Latest Android OS Upgrade! Was working fine up until that. Have authorised app to display over other apps but this hasn't work. Basically alarm doesn't go off until app is opened which means it doesn't go off and isn't reliable. Please help as I love this app.
replyContent: Hello, I'm sorry this happened to you. Please reinstall the app from the Play Store. Unfortunately sometimes Android system updates break my app. I could not find out why. Reinstalling should make it work just fine again. Unfortunately you'll need to set everything up from scratch again. Please let me know the result. Kind regards, Benjamin

content: Does everything you need, super app..
Best wake up to radio alarm I have ever used, and I have tried a few

Hi, love your app! Perfectly adjustable to everyone's needs. Just like to ask, I've paid for the premium version to be able to add more favorites and it still acts as I haven't. Would you be able to help with this or should I contact the store? Thank you.
replyContent: Hello! This sounds as if you are still using the free version of the app (black icon). If you bought and downloaded the ++ version, you should now use this one (blue icon) and you can then uninstall the free version. These are simply two separate apps, you'd have to do a one time setup in the new app again. Hope this helps. Best regards, Ben

content: Love it
Does exactly what says. Easy and well. Radio for alarm.

Totally love this app! It's confugurable and extremely reliable. The only time I didn't get an alarm was due to a fault with the radio streaming service. I got a very quick response to my query from the app developer! I can highly recommend it!
This radio alarm app is the most completed I tried. You can switch on WiFi, or use mp3 instead, customize everything from screen, light, pulse to weather forecast and it never let me down.
Nice

Love this little alarm clock. I've had it for 503 days and have used it only when I'm afraid I'm not going to remember my appointment, it's never let me down! Customer service is amazing when I've had to use it and the owner of this app gets back to you quickly. Thank you!
Very useful for critical wake up calls. I have all my favorite radio content to choose from, and friendly interaction for questions about use.

ABSOLUTE BEAST OF AN APP!!! I used to use Tune in (annual plan) the app was amazing but CRAZY expensive! After moving to this app, I fell in love üòç üòÇ honestly! The app is FREE and has the main feature I used on Tune In. Thank you soooo much for making the app and I really appreciate all the hard work you put in! And I absolutely LOVE the fact that there are no ads and the main features are free forever! Thanks Ben!!! BTW to say thank you, I bought the premium version (same review on both apps)
replyContent: Awesome! ü§ó Thanks for your support and for the reviews and for using my apps :) I'm really happy you like them so much. Thank you!! Ben

content: I love this app when it works but unfortunately its very finicky when it chooses to work. For example it won't always work if my phone is locked, but then if I wake up my screen the alarm that should have happened hours ago will suddenly come on. I wish I knew how to fix this
replyContent:
Hello, 

this happens most probably due to wrong (default) Xiaomi energy settings. Please have a look at the following website, they explain in detail how to fix it. (As far I remember the most important settings are: "ALLOW app auto start" and "DISABLE any background restrictions" for my app, pls) 

https://dontkillmyapp.com/xiaomi

content: Very nice app, does what is needed and adds another useful feature to the smartphone. üëç Suggestion. Any chance you can make the 4x2 radio player widget smaller to fit on a phone screen without the big space in the middle?      I use this to start and stop my selected radio station only without opening the main interface. This widget is extendable on my Motorola E4 plus but not shrinkable in height. PS:- I don't need access to the nap or alarm... just the station and play button.
First app I've found with my local station available
This is the best radio alarm out there in my opinion. Constantly be made better and Benjamin is good about adding requested option. Keep up the good work!

Really a great app but the UI needs a lot of work. Also, I don't need notifications telling me when my next alarm is. Disabled the notifications for this reason and then I could not switch off the alarm when it went off even when I went into the app. Was so out of it I just restarted the phone
replyContent: Hello, the notifications can be disabled inside the app (Misc. settings) in case you did it in Android settings. The problem which did not let you stop the alarm is most probably due to Xiaomi's energy settings! Please see this site to fix it: https://dontkillmyapp.com/xiaomi (app auto start and background restrictions!) Kind regards, Ben

content: For some reason, alarms do not start and it causes a lot of problems. Otherwise, it was a great app. Edit: i have turned on the settings for autostart and checked for any restrictions. Still no alarms in the morning. After the alarm time passed, it shows next alarm as "-2 hours 23 minutes" (to give you an example) . I can send you a screenshot if that helps. My device is OPPO Rmx1801 with android 10.
replyContent: Hello again, I'm sorry it's still not working. Please check this website it offers solutions for this issue for many different manufacturers. Oppo is also listed. Please see if the tips on that site might help: https://dontkillmyapp.com/

content: Awesome app. I'm using this app with an old tablet set up permanently as a clock radio. The alarm has been reliable so far ( i always use a backup alarm anyhow) and i love the sleep, nap and night clock functions. The developer helped by adding a local radio stream and i get to use stations for the various functions I've enjoyed while living in other parts of the world. Well worth the money :D
Simple, yet effective.

Fundamentally Satisfying App, which works like the old fashioned Radio Alarm Clocks (common in hotel rooms). Thank you Benjamin Laws, especially for your immediate repair of ORF O√ñ broken radio station link... amazing work! I'm happy :-)
Best app for listening to radio - even if you don't need it for the alarm, which is also brilliantly designed

This is brilliant, tried the free version and bought this which is even better. Used it for over a year, not one single problem. Thanks for producing a great app that actually works. By the way, I am not related to this provider and am not an affiliate, I just like to show my appreciation for a well crafted product.

Hiya, this is an AMAZING app. I so appreciate you creating it, I tried the free version and eventually decided to install this one too. Totally worth it. I found I wake up with radio alarms much, much more easily compared to a regular ringtone or a chosen song and it's truly a life-saver. I hope many more others discover and make use of this brilliant app!

Great Radio Alarm Clock. Does everything you expect, although coffee would be nice üòâ The only thing (its not a big issue), the visual interface could use an update for example, for a new alarm, when setting it up, its not obvious that 'One Time' is a button that changes to 'Repeat' when touched. Spent ages looking for that initially.
replyContent: Hey, thanks for your review, I'm aware of that and therefore I introduced a tiny visual tutorial in January or February. If someone installs the app new, there are little movements in certain buttons to show the general navigation. One of the steps is the button you mentioned is now moving until you touch it. Hope it helps some people to find it :)

content: Still works after a year. Wakes me every time with my chosen internet radio Station.
Love the music..the stations! little bit confusing trying to set things up and knowing everything it does.. Kind of like reading a manual in another language but still worth figuring it out!
replyContent:
If you have any unanswered questions about some functions, just send a mail :)
Ben

content: Is there anything you haven't thought of when creating this app? It make so much sense! Don't let the old school appearance discourage you.
replyContent:
Thank you very much üòä great to see how much you like it :)

Kind regards,
Benjamin Laws

content: Simple but powerful. I love that the free version is so respectful of the user. This encouraged me to buy the full version as a thank you. I suggest making it easier to switch from the free to the paid version by offering to import settings automatically, including the list of favorites. At the moment, this requires copying manually the favorites file.
Great app
great appdesign an execution, does what it says on the box, every time!
Get experience, no issues, easy to use, low-fuss app Happy to recommend for radioheads!
Perfect. Exactly what I've been looking for.
Perfect alarm clock

Good radio, but didn't wake me up! I am a heavy sleeper. I even got the paid version to get the extra features. But it wasn't loud enough to stir me. Thank goodness I had two other different alarm clocks set. But I do like the radio stations on this app, even if I can't get all three thousand of them!
replyContent:
The app does play the radio as loud as you set it in app settings. If you set it to maximum and still oversleep/don't hear it, you may want to use a very noisy and annoying audio file instead of the radio.  

Default setting is using increasing volume for 30s!
Is this the problem? Can be switched off in alarm settings.  

Ben

content: Downloaded the free version, it's fantastic! I'm getting the paid version as a thank you for the great product and the extra features. I wish I knew about this ap years ago!
Used for years. Does everything I need perfectly.

Used the free one for so long I felt I should donate. This is a really good app. I have an old note 2 that has been promoted to being a full time alarm clock. I like the inclusion of nightclock and the easy access to the torch for night time wanderings. I used a different app for a while for the night clock but it lacked the functionality of the radio alarm that has a backup mp3 alarm. The other app did have sound detection for auto light which I thought was clever. Thanks
Love the night screen. Great sound. So easy to find channels. Improves all the time
replyContent:
Thank you!!

Kind regards,
Ben

content: Great, does everything you need for a radio alarm clock. Paid for this version to support the dev, the extra features are a nice bonus though. Finally unplugged my 25 year old clock radio (saving me ¬£8 a year in electricity!)
Amazing
Works perfectly, worth the money! I have been having troubles getting up lately and this has solved my problems. I love the personal touches from the developer too, and no ads! :D
Great app simple but effective! Use it every day. Love the automatic WiFi option. Paid version is certainly worth it. Keep up the good work!

So far good. Listening to an Ibiza station all afternoon. & I'm in Tennessee. Oh my goodness. Purchased the upgrade, $2.49. Well worth it. Can FAVORITE‚ô° as many station as you like. Over 3085 to choose from all around the WORLD. üò∑ Can't go out, bring the world IN!üò∑üíãüíó
WAITING FOR YOUR REPLY FROM MY Gmail! When I Downloaded this App and Opened it, MY INTIRE PHONR WENT " BLACK AND WHITE!!!!! " DONT NOW HOW OR WHAT TO DO??? PLEASE HELP!
replyContent: Did the issue resolve?

content: Thanks very much! This is exactly what I was looking for, really couldn't be happier :) Great value for money too.

Been using this for years, and was my goto alarm clock while going through grad school. It's really come a long way since it started, the attention to customer issues is phenomenal, and the only issue I had (which was in early 2018) was fixed very quickly; no idea what that issue was at this point.

Excellent. Can add custom feeds if they're not already included (but there are so many in the database there probably already there!) The dev team are extremely responsive too. Probably the best and most used app I've bought. The night clock is excellent and customizable.
Nice choice of stations worldwide
Many stations but takes way too long to learn how to use.
replyContent: Hi, I introduced a little visual tutorial, for basic navigation, just follow the moving icons at first launch after install. For additional info, please tap the question mark in the top right corner of the main page, there you'll find a little text tutorial. If you still have questions, I'd be happy to answer and help you, just send a mail :) Ben

content: Great experience.
A radio alarm is good

One of the best alarm clock radio I have seen so far. It has all features. The best amongst them are about adding multiple alarm, adding radio stream I want and great degree of customisation possible by user. I bought this app instantly after trying free version for few minutes !
Exactly what I was looking for. The best I've tried.
Fabulous especially the night clock

General great and very optimisable. Would like it to auto-stop playing when I unplug a headphone cable like most other apps do. (I often, half-asleep, unplug the cable from my pillow speaker in the mornings and the sounds from this app suddenly comes out of the speakers wakes my wife. BBC iPlayer Radio used to stop sound when cable unplugged; I moved to this app because of the alarm clock.) Update: developer says this is a deliberate feature and justifies it which I appreciate. I'd still like to turn it off, but I've upped from 4 to 5 stars because of the thoughtful response.
replyContent: Hello, this does work in normal radio mode, but it does not in alarm mode on purpose, because one should shut off alarms on purpose and not accidentally by unplugging a cable and then oversleep. Best regards, Ben

content: Works great. Useful features. And developer responds immediately.

Amazing. Found tons of deep ambient drone channels and so on that work perfectly. I'll sleep well tonight. I'll use my normal alarm though since the music on here would never wake me up. I need soft music to sleep to all night and "slowly getting louder" loud music to actually wake up to. So this will be my sleep all night app. Thanks so much for this!

The radio station doesn't work. Please help. I set it up it shows I've chosen a station on the alarm but I get an annoying alarm instead. Changed station and it works. Would really like the other station tho. ;)
replyContent:
Hi, thanks for the log file! I could see that KFI 640 stopped working. I just sent you a mail with instructions on how to get it back to your favorites. Unfortunately they do not share the link officially, so you need to add it manually, but it's really simple! :) If you need help, just send another mail. 

Kind regards,
Benjamin Laws

content: Easy to set alarms. Works reliably. Great selection of radio stations, especially classical. Use the volume control from within the app. Good customer service. Sent an email with a question and received a prompt and helpful reply. This paid version is definitely worth the small extra payment.
Breaks often. Misses too many alarms.
replyContent: Have you got installed any task killer apps or cleaner apps? Anything that should free up memory? Could you please uninstall, reboot your device, then reinstall and give it another try? Thank you.

content: Works well.

Great app but could do with a couple tweeks to be perfect: I would love to be able to set the volume of the radio when it comes on (default is max volume). Also I'd love to set the snooze length for each alarm (currently, default is 5 mins and no function to change it)
replyContent: Hi, you can change both in alarm options: please navigate to main page, cogwheel icon, alarm options. These two settings are global for all alarms though, but still can be adjusted. Volume slider is to be found at the very top and snooze duration a little bit below that. Ben

content: Love the app, Chromecast support would be nice (for better audio quality) - with it I would use it as my main radio app, not just alarm :) Would like to see two more Czech radio stations: radio wave and radio1. Thanks!

I absolutely love this app. I use it daily to help keep me up to date on my meds which are complex. The choices for listening are multiple. I happen to like classical and this app gives me all I can ask for. I love it. I have it on multiple devices. You can move the app to a new device such as a new phone without buying it again but frankly I appreciate it so much I buy it again for each device.
Works as described, plays the selected radio station as an alarm. Huge choice of stations, or you can use a audio file. Lots of options, sleep mode, buzzer after alarm.
Quite simply - it's excellent
It works great. Customer support was great.

Good app except for two things. 1) when you push the nice big turn off button to switch it off you then have to confirm this with a tiny hard to read confirm. Just the one button is fine. 2} whenever you change the settings it sends a notification. This is really annoying. Otherwise it is a great app. Thanks for the response.
replyContent:
Hello, you can disable number one in the alarm settings, a little bit below the volume settings you can find safety settings. Just disable the safety dialog.

The other thing cannot be disabled, but once you've set everything up you'll never see it again :)

Kind regards,
Ben

content: Just what I needed for a better start of the day! Thank you so much!
This is an awesome app. Please please adapt so I can use on my laptop.
replyContent:
I cannot, it's an Android app which is very different to normal computer programs :/ but you could install an Android emulator on your computer to run my app there :)

Ben

content: I really like this app. Most importantly, it has never failed to wake me up! üòä It's fully - featured. I would say it's "old skool" in design, as the kids would say. It reminds me of the days of green screen business apps before mice, icons and whatnot. But, I like that! Good stuff.
Excellent online radio player and timer.

Exactly the app I was looking for to play the radio as an alarm! It works very well, simple and easy to use, with all the functionality I want. All the radio stations I want from multiple countries are there too. The paid version is worth it, not only for the little extra features, but I'm happy to support this developer.
I have tried a half dozen radio alarm clock alarms. This one is the best by far! Thanks
Good app. Nice and simple but with a fair bit of customisation available if needed.
Works great

As a die hard radio alarm clock person I find this app to be just the answer. Best part is Benjamin is extremely responsive to support inquiries. Pay the fee $s and get the premium for the extras, it's worth it! Thanks Benjamin!
Slightly clunky ui but it works well enough to pay for.

When the BBC stopped their radio player app which had an alarm clock feature I tried several alternative apps. All were no where close to the BBC app. This app is, in my opinion better than the BBC app. It does everything as well if not better I am really pleased with it.
Great Radio Alarm, works as expected!
Good experience, value for money

This app is great, and it's obvious the developer has created this out of motivation to solve problems and create solutions. No adverts of any kind, no pushing in-app purchases, no harvesting personal data, it's so refreshing! I don't even need any features of the Paid version, but developers like these deserve to be rewarded!
replyContent:
Thanks for taking the time and creating this very nice review of appreciation!
Made my day :-) And thanks for supporting of course!

Kind regards,
Benjamin Laws

content: Beautiful this app loads streams faster than many other apps I've tried. Developer is very responsive. üòä I've tried other alarms, but I keep coming back to this one. Some of the other radio apps have an alarm, but most are large, busy and full of ads. I love that I can backup my favorites, in case of accidental uninstalls. (it happens)
Excellent app from a quality dev

Wakes me up like a charm, great for naps as well. Really nice app. Worth paying for. Can listen to radio from everywhere as well. Brilliantly developed and easy to use. Would love a quiz feature to disable the alarm. That would improve it. Maths questions or a puzzle.

Excellent radio functions and alarm facility. Can use both simultaneously. Very good admin support also. Quick response to requests to add new radio station requests. I have paid version. Very good! .
Best app of this kind! I enjoy every minute of it! Tks Benjamin.
Great radio & alarm app, very easy to setup and use. Highly recommended for anyone who wants a class radio app for Android
This is better than the free app which happens to be excellent. But I like this one more as it allows more flexibility to make it fit your situation.
Great
I like it a lot. I asked for an additional chanel, and I got it shortly. I recomend it.
Love using this app.the flexibility and choice is great üòÄ
Really useful and interesting
Rock solid, simple radio alarm, just work. If anything can be impove on, the interface can get some cosmetic touch up, it look spartan.
Works like a charm, easy to configure

Excellent app and very responsive developer who will try to add your favorite radio stations to the app on request. The free version works well, but by all means get the paid version if you like the app.
Awesome!

Love it , had a request to add a radio station and a few hours later it's done . Pure class. However the last few weeks I had at least 4 days the alarm did not go off in the morning, has there been any update? I didn't change anything.
replyContent: Thanks a lot!

content: The graphics and controls are fairly basic BUT it works very well. Does the job with confidence. I'd recommend buying the ad free version.
Great experience with this ap. It was missing my favorite radio station and developer added it right away. Everything works superbly for me.

I had been searching for an app like this and I have now been using the free version for several months. It surpassed my expectations and has never let me down. I decided to buy the very reasonably priced paid version as a thank you to the developers who obviously put a lot of thought into this radio alarm clock app and I am only too happy to support. Thank you :)
I liked the free app a lot. Thought I would give this one a try
The interface is blocky and fussy, but it works well.
Very functional and developer is responsive in adding new streams. Just bought the paid version
Best app on the internet. I sent an email requesting a station be added. Befor I knew it the station appeared on the app and my email had been replied to. What a great thing. Thank you :)

Mostly excellent. When it works it goes what it should very well. My only gripe would that that for some reason some times when I put the phone on the charge dock at night the clock does not come on as it should. Can get round it by opening the app and selecting the clock, but wish I knew how to sort this
replyContent: Hi, there is a shorter way to do this workaround. Because one other user also had this kind of problem which we unfortunately could not sort out :/ I implemented a very small 1x1 night clock starter widget. So you may launch the night clock by a single tap from you home screen. (Did you try restarting your device? For some users this was enough)

content: Curious design but works well. Not that there's anything wrong with the design at all and the ability to set music or radio stations a Godsend for those headache and dreaded alarm interface.
replyContent:
Hi! 

What exactly do you dislike regarding the design? 
Did you see that you can choose a custom wallpaper and a dark or bright app color scheme? 
Hope that will help a bit. 

Ben

content: Works Good!
Love it just love it üòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòç
Good stuff!
Very good and easy to use love being able to wake up to digital radii

More reliable than my physical radio alarm clock. I don't know what is the matter with that clock but the radio alarm clock app does *not* start with radio noise... Idea for another improvement: a tap or swipe to suppress the active alarm for a set time (30 sec) to kill the advertisement that is being broadcast. After that time the stream can carry on again. It would be a major improvement of Android if such an option could be built in in the operating system (Youtube would hate it).

Needed to replace my bbci alarm app. The free version of this app is more then enough for my needs but I bought the pro as a thank you. Keep up the good work. Season greetings (merry Xmas) Cheers again!
Tried the free version first! Works great on Fire tablet! Wanted the "pro" features so I upgraded. Recommended!
Worth every penny. Use a digital radio station as my alarm. Brilliant
Works very well! Best alarm clock timer, et !

Very happy with the free version of this app and don't actually *need* any additional functionality, but wanted to buy this paid-for version as a thank you to the developer: the awful BBC Sounds app lacks an alarm function which for me was a crucial part of the sadly discontinued iPlayer Radio app.

Does exactly what I need, plenty of options to customise it and very reliable. I have also discovered a load of new radio stations which I am enjoying. The sleep function is also useful and fades nicely. Quick, helpful replies from the developer too. Keep up the good work! This is a must have app - try the free version and you'll want to upgrade!

Finally a clock radio alarm that does everything that is essential - choice of station per alarm, volume setting, gradual awake, settable on time, screen off if you don't need snooze functions. Interface is cleaner than many others.

content: I love this app. I use it for my main alarm clock and also when I want a 20 minute power nap. It's a little fiddly to start off with but, once you fiddle with it, this app is hard to beat. The developer is quick to reply to queries and requests - I asked for a radio station to be added to the already lengthy list and it was done really quickly: that really impressed me. Thanks for the best (ad free) alarm clock I've found - worth every penny!
replyContent:
Thanks for the nice review! :)

I tried to put the most important steps to start with into the newcomers guide (question mark on the top of the main page).

Kind regards,
Ben

content: Excellent! Well worth the price of admission. Recommended all the way!
replyContent: Thank you!

content: This is the best radio alarm clock in playstore. No ads, easy to use. I love it.
replyContent: Very nice review, thanks a lot!! :)

content: Very easy to use. Does everything I want.

content: Finally found an app to do exactly what I needed, remove the persistent upcoming alarm notification on my OnePlus 6. It does everything I want and love the 70s radio station. Upgraded to to the Pro version to help support it. Thank you and we'll done
replyContent: And thank you too!! :)

content: Absolutely love it!! I had the free version, but I decided to put my money where my review was, and support him.... This app is simply amazing. It is simple to use, intuative, can be personalized to your needs, has step by step instructions for people like myself, and did I mention the nap function?. The developer coded this with the end user in mind. Lastly, if you have any questions or concerns at all, just ask. He is super responsive and will do everything he can, to help you out. Which sadly, is a rare commodity these days.
It is easy to use

content: Love this app, great developer. Responds to feedback with lightning reflexes. App is fantastic, has all possible desirable features I want, and it even LOOKS GREAT hahaha! Saved me from the other alarm I was using, so now I get my gentle classical wake up with zero ads. Love the jellyfish background btw.

Ben

content: Awesome, great app that is replacing my clockradio and will be great for travelling. It has a logical interface with good explanations of functions and features. It is intuative to use and the developer seems to be constantly improving. Update 1.10 (night clock on battery) is great and was going to be a request but now no need. Really like the nap feature. All in all it does what it says very well. Thanks.
replyContent:
Hi,  

1.10 was just in time then, haha.  
The nap feature is my favorite too :)   

Thanks for the evaluation and 5*

Kind regards,
Benjamin Laws

content: The native alarm clock on my s8 sucks for many reasons. This little app ROCKS for even more reasons. Set snooze time? Long list of stations? Super nice and responsive developer? A big yes to all of those. Glad to pay a few bucks for this awesome app

content: Exactly what you want from a radio alarm clock. If you want more stations, be sure to send a request as I will, otherwise you still get plenty of options and from all over the world. Be warned, the app has no control over how often the station plays their own ads, so you may still wake up to talking instead of music, but that's just the station. Great ap, thanks for all the work put into this!

content: This is a great alarm app and hands down the BEST radio alarm clock I have found so so far. Questions were answered in minutes by developer! Love waking up to the radio stations that are streamed through this app!

content:
This is a great app but it is not as complete as it could be. For instance 
it would be nice to be able to choose your own font or the colour of font 
that is used by the app. To be able to change the background to one of your 
own choosing. To received 5 stars this app will need a lot of work to add 
further customisation options. The ability to choose local files on your 
own phone to be your alarm or sleep music is also desirable.
